item.description:
This 2 hour Practice session will provide you with an opportunity to practice or learn safety skills including wet exiting, self and assisted rescues, bracing and rolling techniques. This is a self paced "learn on your own" format practice session. Cost is $20 per person. 

You will bring your own kayak, PFD, Paddle etc.. Please be sure your kayak is very clean inside and out.

Also Cheri Perry and or Turner Wilson will be offering Greenland Style rolling instruction at this event. Please see an additional event posting for this option. 

If you'd like to attend for practice please send a check for $20 made payable to Kayak Ways

Kayak Ways

PO Box 122

Brownfield ME 04010

NOTE: If your payment is not received at least one week prior to the event your RSVP will be removed unless you contact me in advance to make arrangements

Please, do not forget, bring a very clean inside and out kayak to the pool!
item.name: Open Kayak Practice session in Biddeford, ME
